snippet: After initially denying allegations of sexual abuse at three Quebec schools it operated, a Roman Catholic order said that it had settled a class-action lawsuit by the victims.
lead_paragraph: After initially denying allegations of sexual abuse at three Quebec schools it operated, a Roman Catholic order said that it had settled a class-action lawsuit by the victims.

headline.main: Canada: Catholic Order Settles Sexual Abuse Suit for $17 Million
headline.print_headline: Canada: Catholic Order Settles Sexual Abuse Suit for $17 Million
